Menu

Sukhavati

"Land of Bliss"

An art installation that creates a virtual reality world for people to encounter and become spectators of their bodies and minds.

Using virtual reality, 3D depth sensing camera and EEG mind sensor technologies, Sukhavati creates a virtual world that allows the viewer to observe her/himself from an alternate angle. The viewer is immersed in a parallel reality that resembles the same physical room the viewer sits in, quietly contemplating his/her own image composed of thousands of pixel particles. When the viewer loses the state of concentration, his/her self-image transforms into numerous particles that flow freely in the room.

Scattering - Mind Wandering
Forming the Shape- Mind Concentrating
Documented at FLEX Gallery, Shanghai
All rights reserved © ZZYW LLC, 2015 @ New York, NY
Site design & developed by ZZYW

Code generated, interactive logo for Norma Fogelberg

A poetic narrative generated by your own body, The Introspection Game sends you to a journey within, using Oculus Rift, a breath sensor, and a pulse sensor.

An installation comprised of a EEG brain wave sensor and animated projection of ocean. Waves rise and fall in response to the mind activity of the viewer.

Exhibit:Growth is an interactive, immersive exploration of human potential. Inside a stunning geodesic dome, you’ll choreograph a unique visual expression via large-scale, motion-activated digital technology.

A 3D web experience design and developed for NYU profroess Jennifer jacquet's new book "is shame necessary". By using new geneartion web technology, we made the experience smooth and immersive.

Sonnet is a music sharing + playing mobile application. It allows someone who is playing a music on a smartphone to transfer the file and starting playing the same music on another phone in a synchronized fashion by simply bumping it.

FLOW is a virtual reality experience about anxiety and detachment.

An art installation that creates a virtual reality world for people to encounter and become spectators of their bodies and minds.

The Black Box is a real-time interactive installation, the algorithm detects viewers’ heads and places a virtual black box over them.

A notebook, inside which a person’s happy memories are represented and analyzed using Statistical Regression Analysis and Parametric Design. Fabrication process involves laser cutting, sawing, data collection and data visualization.

Joe The Annoying Friend is a Chrome extension reminds you to constantly check in with what’s real before getting sucked into the dreamland of “I wish life could be like this.”

Employing interactive Web Animation, 3D Modeling & 3D printing technique to explore the visual definition of Balance.

Posters generated by Processing language.

Interlaced Faces is an interactive installation that uses the camera to capture 1000 live images of the viewer’s face and place them randomly in a virtual 3D space. Viewer can also use a hand-held kaleidoscope to navigate inside the virtue space.

A pair of light cubes that 24h/7d connect to each other, using the brightness as a symbol.Each light receives measurement of the other light’s ambiance brightness via internet connection and replicates it inside its own cubic shade.

visual identify system designed for the first chinese online sex experience sharing platform - pleashare.

website made for new york company corporate insight. we created the four-layer-menus to structure the information for the best information accessibility.

web creation for a major us-china conference, insipired by the long history of Chinese calligraphy.

converting a static logo into an interactive logo. by various math algorithams, we made the logo alive.

simple and immersive web experience created for new york based start-up lyte. ( page in-progress )
